title: Stormtype.com Newsletter | November 07
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 14.Nov.2007 5.49pm 

**Storm Type Library 3**

Dear friends,

our flagship, [Storm Type Library 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/libraries-16-storm-type-library-3-pro) with around 700 original professional OpenType fonts, is ready for shipping.  
 [Upgrades](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633/http:/stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/index.php) are available for users of STL2.

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stormtype3news_4726.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/libraries-16-storm-type-library-3-pro)

Best regards,

[Stormtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214633/http:/www.stormtype.com/)  
e-service team
author: paul d hunt
